import { InlineInputText } from '@looker/components'

import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyHeadingParagraph from '!!raw-loader!./HeadingParagraph'
import storySimple from '!!raw-loader!./Simple'
import storyDisabled from '!!raw-loader!./Disabled'
import storyReadOnly from '!!raw-loader!./ReadOnly'

<Meta component={InlineInputText} title="Docs/InlineInputText" />

# InlineInputText

An input styled as text, with an underline and hover styles to indicate it is editable.

`InlineInputText` implements `InputText` internally â€“ see [that component's documentation](?path=/docs/docs-inputtext--docs) for more information.

<Editor code={storyHeadingParagraph} />

## Simple

Use the `simple` prop to remove the underline except on hover and focus.

<Editor code={storySimple} />

## Disabled

Use the `disabled` prop to make the input uneditable and greyed out.

<Editor code={storyDisabled} />

## ReadOnly

Use the `readOnly` prop to make the input uneditable and have no underline.

<Editor code={storyReadOnly} />

## Props

<ArgsTable of={InlineInputText} exclude={excludedProps} />
